The transformation of water into wine at the Marriage at Cana or Wedding at 
Cana is the first miracle attributed to Jesus in the Gospel of John. In the Gospel 
account, Jesus, his mother and his disciples are invited to a wedding, and when 
the wine runs out, Jesus delivers a sign of his glory by turning water into wine. ... 
John 2:1-11 states that while Jesus was at a wedding in Cana with his...
